abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio announces he will offer six weeks fully paid parental leave to 20,000 public employees, part of his efforts to expand workers' rights; move will make city one of most generous municipalities with respect to family leave in nation.
lead_paragraph: The plan, which would go into effect next year for 20,000 public employees, is among the most generous municipal family-leave policies in the nation.

headline.main: New York to Offer 6 Weeks Paid Parental Leave to Nonunion Workers
headline.print_headline: Mayor Offers 6 Weeks of Paid Parental Leave to City’s Nonunionized Workers
